title: Summer Splash Cosplay Contest Winners - Sponsored by Logitech

replies.body: Thank you so much!! Just as an FYI my name is spelt wrong in the group pic :D

I proofread it like TEN TIMES. :( I'm sorry!

Congratulations though, I loved your creativity with the pool noodles!

> [{quoted}](name=Achenar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=A84x9nO4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-19T04:27:55.150+0000)
>
> I proofread it like TEN TIMES. :( I'm sorry!
> 
> Congratulations though, I loved your creativity with the pool noodles!

lol! aw thank you <3
Were there only 2 group submissions, or did you miss something?
Just the two this year but they were super creative and cool! :D

OH MY GOD PIK3H'S TRIST COSPLAY AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH

i love it <333
Shoutout to the epic Ziggs cosplay for displaying _**Masculinity**_

They look all great!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

But is there a winter cosplay contest?
Let's see, once it's winter time! :P

Congrats to the winners! 

Interesting to see how some of the champs that were cosplayed would fit the 'pool party' skin line, considering not all of the champs cosplayed have skins with that theme :P
SO HAPPY! I may not of placed but I'm still excited to get an Honourable mention, thank you for the opportunity.
